short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blurs out any AI-related words on the webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension scans web pages for text containing AI-related terminology, then blurs out such words upon processing. Fun chrome extension allowing you to delve into content without the clutter of AI jargon!
